version_description:
Thanks for using Partner Gay Dating App! To make the app better for you, we bring updates to the Apple Store regularly!

- Bug fixes and experience improvements
- We are testing a thing out. Maybe you will see it. May be you won't. Maybe you'll love it. Maybe you won't.

Stay tuned!

Thanks for using Partner Gay Dating App! To make the app better for you, we bring updates to the Apple Store regularly!

- Bug fixes and experience improvements
- We are testing a thing out. Maybe you will see it. May be you won't. Maybe you'll love it. Maybe you won't.

Stay tuned!

Thank you fou using Partner!

We use neural networks to protect you and not to show you people from dangerous places of the city. No registration or personal info required. You are only visible when you ready to meet someone. All messages are deleted in 24 hours, so no trace is left! 100% anonymous gay-dating app.

In this version: bug fixes and general improvements.

version_description:
We’re working nonstop to make "Partner" better for you guys!
In this version:
- Your profile has a brand new UX-design
- Free access if you invite friends
- Free access to messenger for new users
- Only available guys around you - we are constantly deleting all inactive users
- New cool functions in picture gallery

Here we are!
+ Added button of the feed. It means you can see new users and update profiles current users. Fresh meat! Yummy!
+ Added profile cards. Let's swipe LEFT or swipe RIGHT - Gotcha! It matches!
+ iPad improvements. Now it looks much better and some blocks don't squash anymore.
+ Added new localizations and fixed some current issues.
+ Removed SDK Uber. Now Partner's App lost 10MB weight.
+ Nobody forgot for iPhone SE and added some improvements there. No more squashed blocks.

Let's have some chats! Share your opinion about us to support@partnerapp.dating and let's rate us ASAP! :)

New Features in this version iOS App 1.0.16
1. Localized more strings in Arabic and Swedish languages.
2. It has more friendly screens to upload pictures.
3. Partner App Icon is made brighter now unlike before it's too dark and transparent.
4. The more hidden real position of users and much safer.
5. In iPad version, some squashed blocks are fixed and it looks much better now.

- Resolved the problem with the masks. Face recognition analysis enabled on the profile upload photo too.
- Improved the relevance of the users for the swipes cards. Just swipe right to say you're interested.

1. [Improved] Active users get more views. We improved the relevance of the users of the swipe cards.
2. [Free stuff] Free members can now write to users with whom they have a match.
3. [Removed] We removed photo exchange features in a messenger. Sorry, guys.
4. [Added] Some UI design profiles and profile cards have changed.
5. [Improved] Fancier tumbler to the users' feed walls.
6. [Added] More ways to complain and block users. It makes you safer with Partner’s App.
7. [Improved] UI design of Matches and Messages sections.
8. [iPad] Onboarding improvements for iPad version. Now it looks pretty much better in landscape mode.
9. [iPad] Some squashed blocks are fixed and it looks much better now.
10. [Localization] Localized more strings in Italian, German, Arabic, Ukrainian, Korean, Thai, Russian, Japanese, Turkish, French, Swedish, Portuguese, Spanish and Chinese languages.

1. [Improved] We are working hard and make rendering pictures smarter now. We are trying to find your face on the picture and rendering it as well as we can right now. It will make less weird photos when you don’t see everything as well.
2. [Fixed] Sometimes we don’t catch views of all users when they visit and profile each other. We found the bug and squashed it. You will now see more visitors to your profile. Yay!
3. [Free stuff] Free members should wait just 11 hours compared to 24 hours before more pics appear for swiping. Enjoy!
4. [Hidden] Users who do not allow geolocation previously showed as -1m from you before. We have hidden that field for that kind of user now. So no weird numbers in the other profiles.
5. [Improved] Clearer description for the request to access your camera permission. Let’s be clearer and mores transparent. PARTNER needs your camera to upload profile photos.
6. [Improved] The guys before didn’t see our motivational message to force them to write to the pals first after the match. We hope they will be less shy to make the first step now.
7. [iPad] Some squashed blocks are fixed and it looks much better now.
8. [Added] Implemented SDK Apptilaus

Partner 1.1.0 had a huge update before, so we should have some improvements for Partner 1.1.1:
1. [Improved] We forced users now to upload pictures if their first attempt was rejected. Nobody likes to talk with anonymous people.
2. [Added] Enjoy clear guidelines for your photo requirements before you try to upload anything.
3. [Fixed] Some of the photos taken by the front camera do not upload and users get the error "Image is too small". So, we fixed it. He is lifeless, that is faultless.
4. [Fixed] Sometimes, users can see already deleted photos in their profile. We have squashed that bug.
5. [Improved] UI design of My Profile and onboarding sections.
6. [Localization] Localized more strings in Arabic, German, Turkish, French and Chinese languages.
7. [Added] We add the possibility to upload more than one picture in the onboarding registration section.
8. [Fixed] Sometimes, when users would try to use a camera to upload their photo to their profile, the app would crash. We squashed that pesky bug.

Partner 1.1.0 had a huge update before, so we should have some improvements for Partner 1.1.1:
1. [Improved] We forced users now to upload pictures if their first attempt was rejected. Nobody likes to talk with anonymous people.
2. [Added] Enjoy clear guidelines for your photo requirements before you try to upload anything.
3. [Fixed] Some of the photos taken by the front camera do not upload and users get the error "Image is too small". So, we fixed it. He is lifeless, that is faultless.
4. [Fixed] Sometimes, users can see already deleted photos in their profile. We have squashed that bug.
5. [Improved] UI design of My Profile and onboarding sections.
6. [Localization] Localized more strings in Arabic, German, Turkish, French and Chinese languages.
7. [Added] We add the possibility to upload more than one picture in the onboarding registration section.
8. [Fixed] Sometimes, when users would try to use a camera to upload their photo to their profile, the app would crash. We squashed that pesky bug.

1. [World AIDS Day] We turned the icon of the app to the color red for the world AIDS day.
2. [iMessage Sticker pack] Enjoy an original artwork suitable for entertainment in your daily conversation.
3. [Added] Profiles extended. Enjoy more information about other users in the Partner's app.
4. [Improved] Trending Guys Section. This means more attractive guys will be more visible to you now.
5. [Fixed] Out of pics pop-ups showed up empty in dark mode before. We fixed it.
6. [New feature] You can use our stickers in a chat now! And guess what? It's absolutely free - even for free members.
7. [New feature] We added chat with Rick. That's a guy who will help you to be successful in dating. We hope he is going to be your new friend.
8. [Added] Use the local measurements of your country. We added feet and inches!
9. [Improved] UI design of the Profile section.
10. [Flexible App] Geolocation is not required anymore. We are flexible but you should not expect too much in that way.
11. [Added] Tagalog (Filipino) language. Kamusta ka guys?
12. [Improved] Improved UI design of 'My Profile' Section.
13. [Localization] Localized more strings in French, Arabic, Korean, Russian and Chinese languages.
14. [Fixed] Sometimes you saw your profile in the Feed Section. We fixed that pesky bug.
15. [Improved] UI design of Chat Section.
16. [iPad Version Improvements] UI design of User Profiles and Chat's Section.

1. [New feature] We launched live-photo. Upload short videos or live-photos and enjoy how cool users profiles look.
2. [Free stuff] Free members can Like more people daily now. Fewer limits are more enjoyable.
3. [Improved] Time lag for the new portion of cards of the Profile Cards Section is improved and works faster now.
4. [Fixed] Pesky shakes of the buttons in the Profile Section is fixed.
5. [Improved] We now show a more complete preview of the user profile of Chat Section.
6. [Multi-choices] You can choose more than one answer for your profile information.
7. [Improved] UI design of Messages sections.
8. [Pesky bug fixed] If you use the Take Photo option, a mask is not automatically placed on your face as it did previously. So easy to upload more selfies now.
9. [Fewer crashes] We found and reviewed the code we used, and fixed some app crashes.
10. [Improved] UI design of the onboarding sections.
11. [Counters is fixed] We fixed bugs with counters of Views Section. Now it works pretty clearly for anyone.
12. [Improved] Display uploading icon added of the Onboarding section.
13. [iPhone SE] Some squashed blocks are fixed and it looks much better now.
